results.content: Less about "How to Build XYZ", more about "How to Outsource". If you only need the outsource info, this is good stuff. He only covers one website, but the techniques for finding a freelancer and making sure they know their stuff is easily transferable.

results.content: Part of my job requires hiring freelancers for web development and design work. Not something I enjoyed doing as usually I use to find it very difficult to find someone good. After watching this course I am looking forward to hiring now that I have some sort of strategy in place. The course will pay for itself after a week.

After watching this course I am looking forward to hiring now that I have some sort of strategy in place. The course will pay for itself after a week.

results.content:
This course, in the span of a couple hours, was exactly what I needed as I'm looking for different kinds of developers for several projects in the discovery (early) phase of UX design.

I've been on Upwork for several months and have done many non-dev projects. Now, I can immediately apply his insights to those projects – AND for my upcoming Web Dev projects.

This was solid, crisp, and clear — well worth the investment!

results.content: Thanks Mike you have helped me with several things I was finding challenging. Problem solved.
results.content_html: Thanks Mike you have helped me with several things I was finding challenging. Problem solved.

results.content:
Thanks for the presentation. I have some comments that could help Mike complete the course later.
-  It is quite clear that the presentation has been done in a hurry. For example section 5 consists of so many small videos that are about submitting a job request. They could have been combined into one video.
- In the last section Mike didn't give it a reasonable time to receive enough application. The end result was quite funny. The applicants didn't bother to put the requested heading in their reply, or they were new to Upworks. So he just left that section without actually choosing someone.
- It would have been much useful if we could have the same slides as a downloadable resource for future referral.
- Would I need to look for another course of the same type for a complete understanding of the whole process? The answer is Yes.
results.content_html:
